#summary How to upgrade version 1.0 to 1.0.1
#labels Phase-Deploy

Install the new software and then visit each of these pages in turn:

  # /repository/service/admin/changehost.xql
  # /repository/service/admin/migrate-db.xql
  # /repository/service/admin/update-security.html (Run in FF3)
  # /repository/service/admin/migrate-study-1.0-to-1.0.1.xql
  # /repository/service/admin/migrate-draft-1.0-to-1.0.1.xql
  # /repository/service/admin/migrate-study-info-1.0-to-1.0.1.xql
